review: First the positive:*Small enough that it fits behind most TVs.*The USB power cable is long enough to reach the opposite side of a 60" TV.*"Boots up fast " when you turn your TV on.*Can cast almost anything from your phone or PC. You can change the back ground to you Google photos and show the time and weather.The one con:*Even though it connects to my commercial WiFi router at 72.2mbps 802.11n when streaming videos in true HDX it will sometimes buffer and down grade the video to HD or SD. Even though I have 60Mbps internet connection.With that being said this is the third one for my house, one for every TV.
